ygData.subject: RE: Just a rant, nothing important
ygData.msgSnippet: i always feel like a bum when someone dies in my group..i try to let folks know when i am low on mana...sometimes things are so nuts  you don t have time to
ygData.messageBody:
i always feel like a bum when someone dies in my group..i try to let folks
know when i am low on mana...sometimes things are so nuts you don't have
time to say anything....but sometimes....you just lose ppl i suppose....let
me ask this question. sometimes...say an enchanter or someone without alot
of HP, is doing the most damage and all the baddies are on him and he is
getting low..you go to heal him...and you fizzle a time or God forbid
twice...and he is down...then you lose him as a target..you got a second
there you can get him back up...but my targeting loses him...that drives me
nuts...anyone else have that problem?

>From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Just a rant, nothing important
>Date: Wed, 8 Dec 1999 10:47:06 -0500
>
>Ya, you're right. Just something in me felt guilty about leaving. After
>all, I was the group leader, and I had invited people in to the group. But
>next time, I will definately know better... famous last words...
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Paul Heenan [mailto:pheenan@...]
>Sent: 1999/12/08 10:49 AM
>To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Just a rant, nothing important
>
>
>From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
>Personally, I would have left that group...and fast. It was established in
>the beginning that you had problems with teamwork (the loot thing). If I
>see
>that the group is not cooperating from the very start, I leave as quickly
>as
>I can. It's not worth dying over when a better group is probably 10 ft.
>away. Granted, it's not always easy to find another group, I will take
>soloing over dying because of somebody else's stupidity. At least if I die
>solo, I know it was MY fault.
>
>Drizben D'Vorn
>Propagator of Hate
>Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk
>Oblivion Knight of the 30th Circle
>
> > From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
> >
> > Hi all,
> >
> > The following is just a rant. Nothing of substance, just me venting
>about
> > last nites gameplay. If you don't want to read it, feel free to skip.
> >
> > Brytewing, 16th Cleric of the Rathe.
